tag.description: The namespace and ID of the tag which the damage type should be in to pass the check.
tag.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the tag which the damage type should be in to pass the check.

type.description:
[Damage Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/damage_condition_types/in_tag)

Checks whether the type of this damage is in a specified tag.

Type ID: `origins:in_tag`


!!! note

    See [Minecraft Wiki: Tag (Damage types)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Tag#Damage_types) for a list of of damage type tags provided/used in vanilla.
type.markdownDescription:
